text: Scaphis is a genus of air-breathing sea slugs, a shell-less marine pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Onchidiidae. ==Species== According to the World Register of Marine Species (WoRMS), the following species with valid names are included within the genus Scaphis : * Scaphis astridae (Labbé, 1934) * Scaphis atra (Lesson, 1830) * Scaphis carbonaria Labbé, 1934 * Scaphis gravieri Labbé, 1934 * Scaphis lata Labbé, 1934 * Scaphis punctata (Quoy & Gaimard, 1832) * Scaphis straelenii (Labbé, 1934) * Scaphis tonkinensis Labbé, 1934 * Scaphis viridis Labbé, 1934 ==References== Category:Onchidiidae
title: Scaphis
